name: Aussie Battler Tanks
description:
AUSSIE BATTLER TANKS MULTIPLAYER
10 WW2 TANKS, 2 TO 12 PLAYERS WITH HASSLE FREE MULTIPLAYER HOSTING ON CLOUD NETWORK FOR AUSTRALIANS ONLY, 3 GAME MODES TDM CTF CP AND 7 MAPS.
PHYSICS TRACKS AND HIT POINTS DAMAGE SYSTEM WITH AP AND HE SHELLS, AND EACH TANK HAS ITS INDERVIUAL ADVANTAGES.
FILE SIZE ON DISK AFTER INSTALL IS 5GB.
WINNERS ARE GRINNERS COPY AND SHARE WITH FREINDS.

READ ME INFO:
LOWEST PC SPECS - CPU = QUAD CORE 2.6 GHZ, RAM MEMORY = 8 GB,
LOWEST ONBOARD VIDEO = "intel(r) hd graphics 630", WITH AT LEAST 3GHZ QUADCORE CPU.
RECOMEND VIDEO CARDS "AMD R9 390" "AMD RX 580" OR "NVIDIA GTX 970" WITH 4GB OR BETTER.

3 GAME MODES = TDM-TEAM DEATH MATCH, CTF-CAPTURE THE FLAG, CP-CONTROL POINTS DOMINATION.
7 MAPS.
10 WW2 TANKS.
2 TO 12 PLAYERS.

EASY PHOTON CLOUD PLAYER ROUND HOSTING WITH OPTIONS LIKE PASSWORD, FREINDS, PING LIMIT, MUCH MORE.

MENU = ESC.
PLAYER SCORE = TAB.

DRIVE MOVEMENT = ARROW KEYS.
TURRET MOVEMENT = MOUSE
ZOOOM IN OUT = MOUSE WHEEL.
AIM = RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON.
SWAP SHELL TYPE ARMOUR PIERCE OR HIGH EXPLOSIVE = V
VOTE = F1 YES F2 NO.
